name: Vicious Star: kill All
description:
Title: Vicious Star: Kill All

Welcome to "Vicious Star: Kill All", a deeply strategic turn-based game where you can demonstrate unmatched wits and tactics.

In the game, you will be able to combine 27 kinds of characters to form a four-person squad, with a total of 108 possible team combinations, to fight against the monsters besieging the village. Your mission is to exterminate the monsters, protect your homeland, and maintain the peace and tranquility of the village. At the same time, the monster's level will match the character's level within a certain range, so as your characters grow, monsters will also gain stronger skills and attributes.

Each character has 3 unique skills and one common charging skill, which will be your important tools in combat. In your strategic equipment, you can also match 24 kinds of runes with additional features. These features can give you a greater advantage in the battle against monsters.

In addition, the game introduces Rogue-like elements in the end game, allowing you to mix and match strategies more flexibly in battle. There are 75 types of entries to choose from, each with its unique effect. They can be matched in your strategy to achieve the best results.

"Vicious Star: Kill All" is a challenging and fun game, its deep strategic design will let you continuously explore and learn in the game. Whether you are a veteran of strategy games or a newcomer to this type of game, you will find your own fun in this game. Join us now and start your village defense battle!
